,`` Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed!'' Mr Eric Schmidt has been Google's chief executive since July 2001, when he took over the role from Mr Larry Page . Mr Larry Page said Eric Schmidt had done an outstanding job leading Google for the last decade. The results speak for themselves. Google's other co-founder Sergey Brin will focus on strategic projects and new products, the company said.
